name: Khmer Beef Lok Lak
description: Stir-fried cubed beef with a savory brown sauce, served with rice and a fresh salad.

name: Fish Amok
description: Traditional Khmer steamed fish curry with coconut milk and spices, served in a banana leaf.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Strong, sweet Khmer coffee served over ice with sweetened condensed milk.

name: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet glutinous rice served with fresh mango slices and a coconut cream sauce.

name: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy fried vegetable spring rolls served with a sweet and sour dipping sauce.

name: Fresh Coconut
description: Chilled young coconut, refreshing and hydrating.
